allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Jira status time analyzer script

- Parses Jira CSV exports with [CHART] Time in Status field
- Auto-detects status ID to name mappings
- Calculates avg, median, P90 times per status
- Exports results to CSV
- Includes TFI project specific status mappings

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
